["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://opam.ocaml.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"opam"}]," 是 OCaml 的包管理器。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用方式","children":"使用方式"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["首次使用 opam（未运行过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"opam init"}],"）："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"opam init default {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["从 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"opam init"}]," 配置的默认源切换至镜像源："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"opam repo set-url default {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} --all --set-default","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用时如出现 "Duplicate field archive-mirrors" 警告，可根据错误信息手动删除重复配置。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["以 Linux 为例，删除 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.opam/repo/default/repo"}]," 文件中重复的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"archive-mirrors"}]," 条目即可。"]}]]}]

meta.title: OPAM 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
